paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician upon Gittith, A Psalm of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician upon Gittith, A Psalm of David.

paragraphs.content: O LORD our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth! who hast set thy glory above the heavens.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O Lord our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth! who hast set thy glory above the heavens.

paragraphs.content: Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings hast thou ordained strength because of thine enemies, that thou mightest still the enemy and the avenger.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings hast thou ordained strength because of thine enemies, that thou mightest still the enemy and the avenger.

paragraphs.content: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained;
paragraphs.contentHtml: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained;

paragraphs.content: What is man, that thou art mindful of him? and the son of man, that thou visitest him?
paragraphs.contentHtml: What is man, that thou art mindful of him? and the son of man, that thou visitest him?

paragraphs.content: For thou hast made him a little lower than the angels, and hast crowned him with glory and honour.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thou hast made him a little lower than the angels, and hast crowned him with glory and honour.

paragraphs.content: Thou madest him to have dominion over the works of thy hands; thou hast put all things under his feet:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou madest him to have dominion over the works of thy hands; thou hast put all things under his feet:

paragraphs.content: All sheep and oxen, yea, and the beasts of the field;
paragraphs.contentHtml: All sheep and oxen, yea, and the beasts of the field;

paragraphs.content: The fowl of the air, and the fish of the sea, and whatsoever passeth through the paths of the seas.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The fowl of the air, and the fish of the sea, and whatsoever passeth through the paths of the seas.

paragraphs.content: O LORD our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth!
paragraphs.contentHtml: O Lord our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth!
